entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor disconnect #37691
  • This is a matter of how your web server is configured, not about Blazor WebAssembly. #37689
  • Session Value lost only in Chrome after AJAX post #37687
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #37685
  • Add `msftbot` comment when `Needs: Author Feedback` label is added #37683
    Next sprint planning
  • [SPA] Add Connection: Keep-Alive header to the proxied requests #37681
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .net6 minimal API test config overrides only apply after app has been built #37680
  • Consider making RoutingMarkerService public #37679
  • Blazor WASM: Asynchronous calls to JSRuntime causes page re-rendering #37678
  • Cyrillic becomes questions ����� #37677
  • startup.cs missing from ProjectTemplate files #37674
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #37673
  • [Discussion] Announcement: Minimal API renames in RC1 and RC2 #37671
    Discussions
  • Update RZ9992 Diagnostic Error Link #37669
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Enable Ability to Host Blazor Applications in Microsoft, Apple, and Google Play Stores #11082
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server fail build when RuntimeIdentifier present #13245

PullRequests

Created

  • Reenable ComponentsAnalyzer #37692
  • [release/6.0] Enable targeting pack build during source-build #37688
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve restore error reporting during dotnet new #37682
    area-mvc
  • Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37672
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Reenable test #37594
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable targeting pack build during source-build #37652
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions #37663
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Avoid null args when RazorDiagnostic does not have a message #37648
    area-razor.compiler, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine retry enabled test #37684
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Don't start the .NET webassembly app inside the auth iframe. Fixes #37355 #37524
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21518.14 #37667
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix templates with Windows auth option #37666
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • Bump Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version in templates (#37621) #37664
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #37542
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix templates with Windows auth option #37607
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Switch to stable RTM branding #37643
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `075810f` to `16f637f` #37640
    area-infrastructure
  • 34411 HTTP/2 and HTTP/3: Response trailers collection not reset #37627
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure
  • Anonymous delegate variable capture optimization #31756
    area-blazor, community-contribution
